medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain for the past five days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started five days ago and has progressively worsened. Symptoms did not remit despite bowel rest and ibuprofen. The patient experienced intermittent subjective fevers but no chills. Nausea occurred today. Bowel movements have been normal but slightly loose. This type of pain has not been experienced before.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Stage 1B1 squamous cervical cancer; history of ectopic pregnancy; three C-sections.
medical_history.family_history: Mother may have had brain cancer.
